featured.text: The baby panda Yuan Zai at the Taipei Zoo was separated from her mother because of a minor injury that occurred during her birth.
Is synesthesia genetically inherited or acquired after birth?
In 2016, the city council decided to put its 85,000 pigeon population on a birth control pill to block the formation of eggs in birds.
Moreover, because there are fewer humans around, pregnant females often use tea-growing areas as safe shelters to give birth.

other.text: After heated debates and discussions, the government was finally persuaded to consider another 19 effective method: giving the pigeons birth control.

definition.en_def: The act or process of being born; the beginning of life.
definition.example: The birth of the baby brought joy to the entire family.
